com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class TalkingEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BaseEntity
      • com.illcode.meterman.impl.TalkingEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity

    public class TalkingEntity
extends BaseEntity
    An entity that supports "conversations" in the form of TalkTopicS.

      • processTalkAction

        public TalkTopic processTalkAction()

        Returns:
